entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 6:17 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:17 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
